channel.title: Gradio on Devashree Madhugiri

item.title: Deploying a Keras Flower Classification Model with Gradio 🤖️🖼️🌼💻
item.description: A deep learning image classification model can be built using pre-trained modelslike VGG16, VGG19, ResNet, etc., for extracting the features as a part of transfer learning to classify different objects with minimal code. There are variety of attractive flowers in nature with different shapes and enchanting colors. A Computer vision application i.e. a web app can predict the flower species. Such deep learning apps can prove immensely beneficial in agriculture and horticulture domains.
